function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased occurrence of typhoons, hurricanes, and extreme weather conditions leading to loss of lives, properties, and livelihoods","Impact":"Vulnerability to extreme weather events and their aftermath, including health risk from environmental impacts","Mitigation":"Investment in infrastructure and disaster preparedness, implementation of sustainable urban planning and development","Technologies":"Early warning systems, climate-resilient infrastructure, urban design and planning tools","People":"Residents of vulnerable regions, especially in low-lying and disaster-prone areas","Owner":"Government agencies, urban planners, disaster management organizations"},{"Description":"Emergence of novel viruses, insects, and vector-borne diseases due to increase in temperature","Impact":"Increased global risk of infectious diseases, especially in Africa","Mitigation":"Investment in public health systems, disease surveillance and control measures, and climate change adaptation strategies","Technologies":"Advanced disease surveillance tools, climate-resilient healthcare infrastructure, vector control technologies","People":"Global community, especially in vulnerable regions","Owner":"Health ministries, international health organizations, climate change adaptation policymakers"},{"Description":"Ill-preparedness in managing rapid environmental risks induced by climate change","Impact":"Greater vulnerability to global disruptions, as evidenced by the COVID-19 pandemic","Mitigation":"Enhanced global cooperation, investment in early warning systems and disaster preparedness, integration of climate change adaptation into policy and planning","Technologies":"Global surveillance networks, early warning and response systems, climate modeling and prediction tools","People":"Global community, policy makers, disaster response organizations","Owner":"International organizations, global governance bodies, national governments"}]}
